entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
